{
    "name": "Mannheim-Kazanas Conformal Gravity Solution",
    "abbrev": "mannheimKazanas",
    "description": "A solution to conformal gravity that represents a spacetime with a massless, rotating black hole",
    "defined": true,
    "derived": false,
    "signature": -1,
    "dimensions": 4,
    "charts": [
        {
            "chartName": "Cartesian",
            "xlineElement": "ds² = (1 - 2M/(r + M))dt² - (r + M)dr² - r²dθ² - r²sin(θ)^2dφ²",
            "validated": false,
        }
    ],
    "desiredProperties": ["christoffels", "ricci", "riemann", "einstein", "weyl", "g00", "infiniteRedShift", "horizons", "singularities", "limits"]
}[0m
